text: Erich Iltgen (10 July 1940 â€“ 10 June 2019) was a German politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU). He served as the president of the Landtag of Saxony, the state parliament of Saxony, from 1990 to 2009. He was born in Cologne. Iltgen died on 10 June 2019, at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Cologne Category:Politicians from Saxony Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany
title: Erich Iltgen
